# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_NOWEAPONDECALS

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** noWeaponDecals

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Setup an entity to not receive weapon decals
